item.title: You Won't Believe What Happens When You Scan Roll Up The Rim To Win!
item.description: Introduction to Roll Up The Rim To Win Roll Up The Rim To Win is a popular Canadian promotion by Tim Hortons. It is a game that gives customers a chance to win prizes or discounts when they purchase a participating product and scan the Roll Up The Rim To Win tab. Overview of the Process The process of participating in Roll Up The Rim To Win is simple. Customers must first purchase a participating product from Tim Hortons.
